verbose_text: For example, the acquisition of dsr genes (and a few other genes) in some GSB allowed complete oxidation of sulfur to sulfite (and ultimately to sulfate), which provides better energy conservation and more electrons for CO 2 fixation per sulfide consumed than the incomplete oxidation to elemental sulfur allowed by sqr genes alone.
evidence: dsr genes (and a few other genes) in some GSB allowed complete oxidation of sulfur
